Plot: In an Earthly world resembling the 1950s, a cloud of space radiation has shrouded the planet, resulting in the dead becoming zombies that desire live human flesh. A company called Zomcon ...
Title: Fido
Writer: Robert Chomiak, Andrew Currie, Dennis Heaton, Dennis Heaton (original story)
Actors: Jan Skorzewski, Kevin Tyell, Andy Parkin, Lynn Pendleton
tomatoConsensus: Making the most of its thin premise, Fido is an occasionally touching satire that provides big laughs and enough blood and guts to please gorehounds.
